title: candaNa kATTinuLLE
sahitya:
(rAgA:  jOnpuri)   
  candaNa kATTinuLLE sallApam sheidiDa vandiDuvEn ena vAkku koDuttAn


anupallavi

  enda dishai irundu vindan varuvAnO en tuyarkku marundu tandu magizhvAnO kamazhum
				(rAg  suraTi)


caraNam 1    tilakamiTTEn nalla kugilum koNDEn nAn karum kuzhal niraikkavE malar pala vaghai vaittEn
silambaNindEn sakala singAram sheidu koNDEn ulagai marandEn endan nAthanai ninaindEn kamazhum
    caraNam 2  				(rAgA:  shahAnA)				Aa:S R2 G3 M1 P M1 D2 N2 S  Av:  S N2 S D2 N2 D2 P M1 G3 M1 R2 G3 R2 S  nalla sakunam kaNDEn uLLam adil magizhndEn nADiyE ODi vandEn nAthanillai
pollA shollum tanimai tuyar tollaiyil tiNDADi kAtiirundEn vazhi pArttirundEn sakhi
    caraNam 3  				(rAgA:  punnAgavarALi)Aa:N2 , S R1 G2 M1 P D1 N2  Av:  N2 D1 P M1 G2 R1 S N2 ,  anru inda nIla mayil tOghai virittADi azhagAi engaL munnE ADi varavillaiyA
inda karunAgam em iruvar munnE orunAL isaikku paDam eDuttu ADavillaiyA narumaNam tigazhum
    caraNam 4  				(rAgA:  cArukEsi)Aa:S R2 G3 M1 P D1 N2 S  Av:  S N2 D1 P M1 G3 R2 S  nalla veN paTTADai aNindu pErazhaguDan nallavan pOl arugil mella vandE aNaindAn
sollavE muDiyAda sukham palamurai tandu senradaiyum ninaittu vADi ninrEn narumaNam tigazhum
    caraNam 5  				(rAgA:  tilang)Aa:S G3 M1 P N3 S  Av:  S N2 P M1 G3 S  cancalattAl nondEn sarasanum uDan vandE konji kulavi ennai kaTTi tazhuvinAr 
UDal UTrilE kuLittOm kaLittOm inba UnjaililE amarndOm ulaginaiyE marandOm
enda dishai irundu vindan varuvAnO en tuyarkku marundu tandu magizhvAnO kamazhum
